lead_paragraph: LEVY--Dinah. After 101 years of a joyful life, Dinah Levy passed away on January 31, 2016. Mother of Farrel and Jonathan Levy, grandmother of Julia Duffy, Emma Tung and Caroline Levy. 1/3
